info.title: AXIS MIND - AI Document Intelligence
info.description: Query uploaded PDF documents, transcribe YouTube videos, and manage your knowledge base using AI-powered semantic search. All answers are grounded in actual document content for maximum accuracy.

post.description: Retrieve factual answers from a specific document using semantic search. The answer is generated from the actual document content, not from general knowledge. Always cite the document_id when sharing answers.

document_id.description: The unique ID of the uploaded document (obtained from upload response or document report)

question.description: The specific question to ask about the document. Be clear and specific for best results.

200.description: Answer generated successfully from document content

answer.description: AI-generated answer based exclusively on the document's content. This is factual information extracted from the source material.

post.summary: Transcribe YouTube video to searchable PDF
post.description: Download audio from a YouTube video, transcribe it using OpenAI Whisper, and generate a formatted PDF document. The transcription is then available for querying. Returns a downloadable PDF.

schema.description: PDF file containing the complete video transcription with formatting

get.summary: Get list of all uploaded documents
get.description: Retrieve a CSV report of all documents in the knowledge base, including document IDs, titles, and upload timestamps. Use this to find document_id values for querying.

schema.description: CSV file with columns: document_id, title, uploaded_at. Each row represents one document in the knowledge base.

delete.summary: Delete a document from the knowledge base
delete.description: Permanently remove a document and all its associated data from the vector database. This action cannot be undone.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the document to delete
